hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWR_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, SITE_NAME, EOWR_ORDER_NO, EOWR_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWR_DOWNSTREAM_NO, EOWR_DELIVERY_NO, EOWR_DRIVER_CODE, EOWR_DRIVER_NAME, EOWR_CAR_NO, EOWR_DRIVER_PHONE, EOWR_STEVEDORAGE_TYPE, EOWR_RETURN_APPLICATION_NO, EOWR_BACK_REASON, EOWR_VAMP_NO, EOWR_WAVE_COUNT_NO, EOWR_DISPATCH_DATE, EOWR_LOADING_DATE, EOWR_DEPARTURE_DATE, EOWR_ELECTRONIC_DATE, EOWR_CUSTOMER_SIGNER, EOWR_CUSTOMER_SIGN_DATE, EOWR_SIGNER, EOWR_SIGN_DATE, EOWR_CONTRACT_NO, EOWR_LOADGROUP_CODE, EOWR_LOADGROUP_NAME, EOWR_MANAGER_NAME, EOWR_MANAGER_CODE, EOWR_RECEIVING_DATE, EOWR_REAL_SHIP_DATE, EOWR_CARRIER_CODE, EOWR_CARRIER_NAME, EOWR_PLAN_QUANTITY, EOWR_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWR_QUANTITY, EOWR_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWR_NET_WEIGHT, EOWR_VOLUME, EOWR_STATUS_CODE, EOWR_STATUS_NAME, EOWR_ORDER_BIG_TYPE, EOWR_TASK_BIG_TYPE, EOWR_RELEASE_SYSTEM_CODE, EOWR_RELEASE_SYSTEM_NAME, EOWR_SCHEDULING_QUANTITY, EOWR_SHIPPING_QUANTITY, EOWR_SIGN_QUANTITY, EOWR_DELIVERY_QUANTITY, EOWR_RECEIVING_QUANTITY, EOWR_SUBSTR1, EOWR_SUBSTR2, EOWR_SUBSTR3, EOWR_SUBSTR4, EOWR_SUBSTR5, EOWR_SUBSTR6, EOWR_SUBDATE1, EOWR_SUBDATE2, EOWR_SUBDATE3, EOWR_SUBNUM1, EOWR_SUBNUM2, EOWR_SUBNUM3, EOWR_SHIPPER_PWH_CODE, EOWR_CONSIGNEE_PWH_CODE, EOWR_PICKING_WH_DATE, EOWR_OUT_WH__DATE, EOWR_OUT_WH_QUANTITY, EOWR_RECEIVE_FLAG, EOWR_REJECT_QUANTITY, EOWR_DOWN_ORDER_TYPE, EOWR_BUSINESS_STATE, EOWR_UP_BILLING, EOWR_DOWN_BILLING, EOWR_FINANCIAL_STATE FROM EO_WORK_RECYCLE WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOWR_ID LIKE :eowrId>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE :companyName>> <<AND SITE_NAME LIKE :siteName>> <<AND EOWR_ORDER_NO LIKE :eowrOrderNo>> <<AND EOWR_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :eowrWorkOrderNo>> <<AND EOWR_DOWNSTREAM_NO LIKE :eowrDownstreamNo>> <<AND EOWR_DELIVERY_NO LIKE :eowrDeliveryNo>> <<AND EOWR_DRIVER_CODE LIKE :eowrDriverCode>> <<AND EOWR_DRIVER_NAME LIKE :eowrDriverName>> <<AND EOWR_CAR_NO LIKE :eowrCarNo>> <<AND EOWR_DRIVER_PHONE LIKE :eowrDriverPhone>> <<AND EOWR_STEVEDORAGE_TYPE LIKE :eowrStevedorageType>> <<AND EOWR_RETURN_APPLICATION_NO LIKE :eowrReturnApplicationNo>> <<AND EOWR_BACK_REASON LIKE :eowrBackReason>> <<AND EOWR_VAMP_NO LIKE :eowrVampNo>> <<AND EOWR_WAVE_COUNT_NO LIKE :eowrWaveCountNo>> <<AND EOWR_DISPATCH_DATE > :eowrDispatchDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_DISPATCH_DATE <= :eowrDispatchDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_LOADING_DATE > :eowrLoadingDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_LOADING_DATE <= :eowrLoadingDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_DEPARTURE_DATE > :eowrDepartureDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_DEPARTURE_DATE <= :eowrDepartureDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_ELECTRONIC_DATE > :eowrElectronicDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_ELECTRONIC_DATE <= :eowrElectronicDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_CUSTOMER_SIGNER LIKE :eowrCustomerSigner>> <<AND EOWR_CUSTOMER_SIGN_DATE > :eowrCustomerSignDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_CUSTOMER_SIGN_DATE <= :eowrCustomerSignDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_SIGNER LIKE :eowrSigner>> <<AND EOWR_SIGN_DATE > :eowrSignDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_SIGN_DATE <= :eowrSignDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_CONTRACT_NO LIKE :eowrContractNo>> <<AND EOWR_LOADGROUP_CODE LIKE :eowrLoadgroupCode>> <<AND EOWR_LOADGROUP_NAME LIKE :eowrLoadgroupName>> <<AND EOWR_MANAGER_NAME LIKE :eowrManagerName>> <<AND EOWR_MANAGER_CODE LIKE :eowrManagerCode>> <<AND EOWR_RECEIVING_DATE > :eowrReceivingDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_RECEIVING_DATE <= :eowrReceivingDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_REAL_SHIP_DATE > :eowrRealShipDateFrom>> <<AND EOWR_REAL_SHIP_DATE <= :eowrRealShipDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOWR_CARRIER_CODE LIKE :eowrCarrierCode>> <<AND EOWR_CARRIER_NAME LIKE :eowrCarrierName>> <<AND EOWR_PLAN_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrPlanQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_PACKAGE_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrPackageQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_GROSS_WEIGHT LIKE :eowrGrossWeight>> <<AND EOWR_NET_WEIGHT LIKE :eowrNetWeight>> <<AND EOWR_VOLUME LIKE :eowrVolume>> <<AND EOWR_STATUS_CODE LIKE :eowrStatusCode>> <<AND EOWR_STATUS_NAME LIKE :eowrStatusName>> <<AND EOWR_ORDER_BIG_TYPE LIKE :eowrOrderBigType>> <<AND EOWR_TASK_BIG_TYPE LIKE :eowrTaskBigType>> <<AND EOWR_RELEASE_SYSTEM_CODE LIKE :eowrReleaseSystemCode>> <<AND EOWR_RELEASE_SYSTEM_NAME LIKE :eowrReleaseSystemName>> <<AND EOWR_SCHEDULING_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrSchedulingQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_SHIPPING_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrShippingQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_SIGN_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrSignQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_DELIVERY_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrDeliveryQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_RECEIVING_QUANTITY LIKE :eowrReceivingQuantity>> <<AND EOWR_SUBSTR1 LIKE :eowrSubstr1>> <<AND EOWR_SUBSTR2 LIKE :eowrSubstr2>> <<AND EOWR_SUBSTR3 LIKE :eowrSubstr3>> <<AND EOWR_SUBSTR4 LIKE :eowrSubstr4>> <<AND EOWR_SUBSTR5 LIKE :eowrSubstr5>> <<AND EOWR_SUBSTR6 LIKE :eowrSubstr6>> <<AND EOWR_SUBDATE1 > :eowrSubdate1From>> <<AND EOWR_SUBDATE1 <= :eowrSubdate1To + 1>> <<AND EOWR_SUBDATE2 > :eowrSubdate2From>> <<AND EOWR_SUBDATE2 <= :eowrSubdate2To + 1>> <<AND EOWR_SUBDATE3 > :eowrSubdate3From>> <<AND EOWR_SUBDATE3 <= :eowrSubdate3To + 1>> <<AND EOWR_SUBNUM1 LIKE :eowrSubnum1>> <<AND EOWR_SUBNUM2 LIKE :eowrSubnum2>> <<AND EOWR_SUBNUM3 LIKE :eowrSubnum3>> <<AND EOWR_SHIPPER_PWH_CODE LIKE :eowrShipperPwhCode>> <<AND EOWR_CONSIGNEE_PWH_CODE LIKE :eowrConsigneePwhCode>> <<AND EOWR_DOWN_ORDER_TYPE LIKE :eowrDownOrderType>> <<AND EOWR_BUSINESS_STATE LIKE :eowrBusinessState>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
